</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return a list of all dead units including agents and destroyed vehicles. Dead units may be in vehicles. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>{ [[deleteVehicle]] _x } [[forEach]] [[allDead]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

{
	_all [[pushBack]] [[agent]] _x;
} [[forEach]] ([[agents]] - [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[teamMemberNull]]]);
allAlive = _all - [[allDead]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
